column4: Dick be careful

If you're serious...That would require:* Maddox to acknowledge Dick's existence on a Madcast Media podcast, something Maddox doesn't have the balls to do himself.* Dick's voting system to be something that he/we all hold dearly and is a core concept to the show, which it isn't really.* Maddox to have enough fans that would care to make a noticlable difference, Maddox has about 11 rabid fans left.TL;DREverything will be a-okay bucko.
Oh no, what would we do if the amazing Dick Show Voting System™ that nobody's touched and Dick hasn't mentioned since like a few months into the show was compromised?!

Jokes aside, he would never do that, because he would be promoting The Dick Show to those last remaining fans that don't even realise Dick has his own show yet. He would lose every single listener he has.
